text: Xinyi Anhe is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of this station is R04. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Tamsui and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan. == Around the station == *Taipei Film Commission Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Xinyi Anhe metro station
